OLS¶

class ols.OLS(fit_intercept: bool = True, check_singularity: bool = True)¶

Implement linear regression, estimated with the OLS method

fit(X, y, compute_statistics: bool = False)¶

fit model, X is numpy.ndarray y is numpy.ndarray

get_R2(y, res)¶

Compute and return R^2 - coefficient of determination

get_covariance_matrix(X, beta, sigma_2)¶

inputs are all np.ndarray() -s

static get_p(z, sample_size: int = 10000)¶

Calculate p-value, having z-statistics input array

get_sigma_2(res, n: int, k: int)¶

If the model is fitted, get sigma^2 (estimate)

predict(X, add_intercept: bool = True)¶

Predict on data, return y_hat add_intercept : pick True if training set used intercept
